data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Consider your resources, what abilities do you personally have? Can ____ program, draw, and ____ a ____? How ____ money ____ you ____ and ____ much ____ are ____ going ____ spend ____ it? Do ____ have ____ technology ____ build a game ____ do ____ need ____ get ____? Do you know what you need?
data.partBlankContent: Consider your resources, what abilities do you personally have? Can y__ program, draw, and ren___ a pol____? How mu__ money d_ you ha__ and h__ much ti__ are y__ going t_ spend o_ it? Do y__ have t__ technology t_ build a game o_ do y__ need t_ get i_? Do you know what you need?
data.fullContent: Consider your resources, what abilities do you personally have? Can you program, draw, and render a polygon? How much money do you have and how much time are you going to spend on it? Do you have the technology to build a game or do you need to get it? Do you know what you need?
data.answer: 考虑你的资源，你个人拥有什么能力?你能编程、绘制和渲染一个多边形吗?你有多少钱和你打算花多少时间在它上面?你是否拥有开发游戏的技术，或者你是否需要去获得它?你知道你需要什么吗?
